price: 21. Waxaa idiinku sugan Rasuulka Alle tusaale wanaagsan17 uu raaco mid kastoo rajeeya (la Kulanka) Alle iyo Maalinta Aakhiro, oo xusa Alle in badan.
arabic: لَّقَدۡ كَانَ لَكُمۡ فِي رَسُولِ ٱللَّهِ أُسۡوَةٌ حَسَنَةٞ لِّمَن كَانَ يَرۡجُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَٱلۡيَوۡمَ ٱلۡأٓخِرَ وَذَكَرَ ٱللَّهَ كَثِيرٗا
footnotes: 17. Nabiga s.c.w. waa tusaale lagu daydo oo la raaco xag kasta nolosha iyo xagga jihaadkaba.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: laqad kāna lakum fī rasūli al-lahi us'watun ḥasanatun liman kāna yarjū al-laha wal-yawma al-ākhira wadhakara al-laha kathīran
